placeholder.sr: Arrowhead Service Registry where the service will be registered.
placeholder.authinfo: Auth. Info. of the provider system.
placeholder.system: Arrowhead system related to the service that will be registered.
placeholder.path: The path (or uri) where the service will be listening to. e.g. /example
placeholder.serviceDefinition: The definition (or name) of the service that will be registered.
placeholder.replace: Delete previously registered services for the given definition before registering the new one.
placeholder.name: The visible name of the node.
